entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
